K ä¸ªä¸€ç»„ç¿»è½¬é“¾è¡¨ ç›¸å¯¹æ¯”è¾ƒç®€å•çš„ è®¡ç®—å¾ªç¯ä½“çš„ä¸ªæ•° c = n/k; c == 0 ç›´æ¥è¿”å›; c > 0 æ¯ä¸ªå­å¾ªç¯å¤„ç†ï¼› å­å¾ªç¯å¤„ç†ï¼Œ é‡ç‚¹åœ¨äºè®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªå­å¾ªç¯çš„èµ·ç‚¹å’Œç»ˆç‚¹ ä»¥åŠ å½“å‰çš„ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼›ç”¨äºæ¯ä¸ªå­å¾ªç¯çš„é“¾æ¥ class Solution { public ListNode reverseKGroup(ListNode head, int k) { int n = 0 ; ListNode tempNode = head; while (tempNode != null) { tempNode = tempNode.next; n = n + 1; } int c = n / k; if (c == 0) { return head; } else { ListNode result = null; ListNode temp = null; ListNode lastNode = null; while (c-- > 0) { int nk = k; ListNode start = null; ListNode end = null; while (nk-- > 0) { if (end == null) { end = head; } temp = head.

item.description: 200. å²›å±¿æ•°é‡ æ€è·¯ å›¾éå†ï¼Œdfs å¯¹äºéå†è¿‡çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œ è®¾ç½®'2' class Solution { public int numIslands(char[][] grid) { int result = 0; for (int i=0; i<grid.length; i++) { for (int j=0; j<grid[0].length; j++) { if (grid[i][j] == '1') { dfs(grid, i, j); result ++; } } } return result; } public void dfs(char[][] grid, int i, int j) { if (i<0 || i>=grid.length || j<0 || j>=grid[0].length || grid[i][j]!='1') { return; } grid[i][j] = '2'; dfs(grid, i-1, j); dfs(grid, i+1, j); dfs(grid, i, j+1); dfs(grid, i, j-1); } } 46.

item.title: ç±»å‹é¢˜-äºŒåˆ†
item.description: 33. æœç´¢æ—‹è½¬æ’åºæ•°ç»„ æ€è·¯ äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾ã€‚ æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå±‚çº§çš„éå†ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å“ªä¸€ä¾§æ˜¯é¡ºåºçš„ã€‚ nums[0] < nums[mid] , åˆ™å·¦ä¾§æœ‰åºã€‚ nums[0] > nums[mid] åˆ™å³ä¾§æœ‰åºã€‚ class Solution { public int search(int[] nums, int target) { int len = nums.length; if (len == 0) { return -1; } int i = 0, j = len -1; while (i <= j) { int mid = (i + j) / 2; if (nums[mid] == target) { return mid; } if (nums[0] <= nums[mid]) { if (nums[0] <= target && target < nums[mid]) { j = mid - 1; } else { i = mid + 1; } } else { if (nums[mid] < target && target <= nums[len - 1]) { i = mid + 1; } else { j = mid - 1; } } } return -1; } } 4.

item.title: ç±»å‹é¢˜-åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ
item.description: æ— é‡å¤å­—ç¬¦çš„æœ€é•¿å­ä¸² æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£ï¼›åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ å·¦å³æŒ‡é’ˆéƒ½åªéå†ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼› æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(n) ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(âˆ£Î£âˆ£) (å‡ºç°çš„å­—ç¬¦çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼‰ class Solution { public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) { Set<Character> record = new HashSet<>(); int ans = 0, n = s.length(); int j = -1; for (int i=0; i<n; i++) { if (i != 0) { record.remove(s.charAt(i-1)); } while (j+1 <n && !record.contains(s.charAt(j+1))) { record.add(s.charAt(j+1)); j = j+1; } ans = Math.max(ans, j-i+1); } return ans; } } 15. ä¸‰æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ æ€è·¯ æ’åº + åŒæŒ‡é’ˆï¼› æ³¨æ„è¾¹ç•Œ
